pages.text: Manticoceras is a gephuroceratid ammonite who are fast moving nektonic carnivores. They were quite small, comparable to Goniatites. Manticoceras lived throughout the Devonian period in marine environments.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Kill for Eggs/Bucket
